name: Z.E.U.S: The Faulty Robot
description:
Every time Z.E.U.S jumps, he shoots 2 dangerous bolts of lightning from his circuits!

Avoid hitting the servers that keep his code running, and reach the end of the level before time runs out!

(The game is Windows only, for now. a Linux build may appear in the future, but don't expect a Mac release!)

Credits:

Pixelrino: Approx. 99.9% of this!

Special Thanks:

TetroniMike (He gave me an idea that I built off of!)

TheFamiliarScoot (Helped me set up a funky custom camera system)
